MessageResponse

public struct MessageResponse: JSONDecodable

A response from the Conversation service.

  • json

    The raw JSON object used to construct this model.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let json: [String: Any]
  • input

    The user input from the request.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let input: Input?
  • alternateIntents

    Whether to return more than one intent. Included in the response only when sent with the request.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let alternateIntents: Bool?
  • context

    Information about the state of the conversation.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let context: Context
  • entities

    An array of terms from the request that were identified as entities. The array is empty if no entities were identified.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let entities: [Entity]
  • intents

    An array of terms from the request that were identified as intents. Each intent has an associated confidence. The list is sorted in descending order of confidence. If there are 10 or fewer intents then the sum of the confidence values is 100%. The array is empty if no intents were identified.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let intents: [Intent]
  • output

    An output object that includes the response to the user, the nodes that were hit, and messages from the log.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public let output: Output
  • init(json:)

    Used internally to initialize a MessageResponse model from JSON.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(json: JSON) throws
